item.title: Jo Stafford - You Belong To Me
item.description:
See the pyramids
along the Nile
Watch the sun rise
on a tropic isle
Just remember darling
all the while
You belong
to me
See the marketplace
in old Algiers
Send me photographs
and souvenirs
Just remember
when a dream appears
You belong to me
I’ll be so alone
Without you
maybe your
Be lonesome too
and blue
Fly the ocean
in a silver plane
See the jungle
when it wet with rain
Just remember
till your home again
You belong to me
I’ll be so lonely
Without you
maybe your
Be lonesome too
and blue
Fly the ocean
in a silver plane
See the jungle
when it wet with rain
But remember darling
till your home again
You belong
to me-
